SMW Subobject for UnchargedHigh Alchemy value: 1200Examine: A mystical ring.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Ring of the elementsUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Ring of the elements (uncharged).pngWeight: 0.010Value: 2000Version anchor: UnchargedRelease date: 23 March 2022Item ID: 26815

The ring of the elements is an item purchased from the Guardians of the Rift reward shop for 400 Abyssal pearls. It teleports players near the elemental runic altars.

The ring is charged with one of each elemental rune and one law rune (costing 151 per teleport), up to a maximum of 10,000 charges (costing 1,510,000 to fully charge). Players can receive the runes back through the ring's right-click "Uncharge" option while at a bank. Regardless of charge, the item counts as a piece of warm clothing at Wintertodt, and is the only ring slot item to do so.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
31 March 2022
(update) 		Hotfix

The ring of elements can no longer be uncharged away from a bank.

30 March 2022
(update)

The "Check" option on the charged ring has been changed to "Uncharge", allowing players to receive the runes used upon doing so.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The ring's setting is in the same shape as the head of the elemental talisman.
  • The ring's teleport animation changes color to match the destination altar.

The '''ring of the elements''' is an item purchased from the [[Guardians of the Rift]] reward shop for 400 [[Abyssal pearls]]. It teleports players near the [[Runic altar#Elemental|elemental runic altars]].

The ring is charged with one of each elemental rune and one law rune (costing {{Coins|{{GEP|Air rune}} + {{GEP|Water rune}} + {{GEP|Earth rune}} + {{GEP|Fire rune}} + {{GEP|Law rune}}|c}} per teleport), up to a maximum of 10,000 charges (costing {{Coins|({{GEP|Air rune}} + {{GEP|Water rune}} + {{GEP|Earth rune}} + {{GEP|Fire rune}} + {{GEP|Law rune}}) * 10000|c}} to fully charge). Players can receive the runes back through the ring's right-click "Uncharge" option while at a bank. Regardless of charge, the item counts as a piece of [[warm clothing]] at [[Wintertodt]], and is the only ring slot item to do so.

*The ring's teleport animation changes color to match the destination altar.
